mapper.select: SELECT MREG.SEQ, MREG.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ, MREG.ID, MREG.PW, MREG.SSN, MREG.NICK, MREG.ADDRNUMBER, MREG.ADDR1, MREG.ADDR2, MREG.ADDR3, MREG.EMAIL, MREG.PHONENUMBER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWER=MREG.SEQ) FOLLOWER , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FOLLOW WHERE FOLLOWING=MREG.SEQ) FOLLOWING , MIMG.FILEPATH FROM MEMBER_REG MREG LEFT JOIN MEMBER_PRO_IMG MIMG ON MREG.SEQ = MIMG.MEMBER_REG_SEQ WHERE ID=#{id}

SELECT B.SEQ AS BOARD_SEQ, H.SEQ AS HEAD_SEQ, H.HEAD AS HEAD, MEMBER_CODE_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REG_DATE, VIEW_NUM, RECOM_NUM , (SELECT NICK FROM MEMBER_REG WHERE MEMBER_REG.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = B.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ) AS NICK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_SEQ = B.SEQ) AS REPLY FROM BOARD B JOIN HEAD H ON B.HEAD_SEQ = H.SEQ WHERE MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = #{member_code_seq}

SELECT H.HEAD HEAD, B.TITLE TITLE, R.CONTENT CONTENT, R.REG_DATE REG_DATE, M.NICK NICK FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER_REG M ON R.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = M.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ JOIN BOARD B ON B.SEQ = R.BOARD_SEQ JOIN HEAD H ON H.SEQ = B.HEAD_SEQ WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = #{member_code_seq}
SELECT ID FROM MEMBER_REG WHERE ID=#{id} AND PW = CRYPTPACK.ENCRYPT(#{pw}, #{pw})
SELECT PRG.SEQ FROM PS_REG PRG JOIN PS_REQ PRQ ON PRQ.SEQ = PRG.PS_REQ_SEQ WHERE PRQ.MEMBER_CODE_SEQ = #{member_code_seq}
